3.0.30.description: Removed custom jQuery version. Now it depends on the Wordpress version.

3.0.28.description: Removed requirement for the Gutenberg plugin, shortcodes from expanding in teasers. Added support for the ARVE/NextGenThemes embed block and a License.txt file.

3.0.27-beta.description: Remove requirements for Classic Editor, fixing the version compare, misc fixes.

3.0.26-beta.description: Fixed Theme cache files not working in some hosting.

3.0.25-beta.description: Fixed a bug with the sidebar hiding and 3-up grids.

3.0.21-beta.description: Removing of Piklist and adding support for title, class, etc attributes in the menu system.

3.0.18-beta.description: Adds the shortcode block and a new CTA block.

3.0.17-beta.description: Fixes the footer logo missing when the Sabbath column is hidden.

3.0.16-beta.description: Fixes the breakout block on the wrong grid alignment.

3.0.14-beta.description: Adding dropdown support in the secondary menus, removing hardcoded WPML menu, and fixing the version number.

3.0.13-beta.description: Fixes an issue with the paragraphs block not displaying functioning correctly. This removes the custom block and goes back to the default core paragraphs block.

3.0.12-beta.description: Fixed an issue with i18n phrases not using the correct function.
3.0.12-beta.upgrade_notice: This fixes an issue with the frontend getting a fatal error.

3.0.11-beta.description: Fixed an issue with i18n phrases not using the correct function.
3.0.11-beta.upgrade_notice: This fixes an issue with the frontend getting a fatal error.

3.0.10-beta.upgrade_notice: This is the second beta release. Significant changes have been made between the alpha and beta versions.

3.0.9-beta.description: Significant changes and bug fixes to prepare for the final release. Check the CHANGELOG.md for details.
3.0.9-beta.upgrade_notice: This is the first beta release. Significant changes have been made.

3.0.7-alpha.description: Removing the old wp-updates-theme.php and adding the Kernl theme update code.

3.0.5-alpha.description: Updating the version number to ensure Kernl is working.
